channel.title: Run server error
channel.description:
Okay when adding nomad into npc.cfg , this
[code]npc = 8528 Nomad 850 10000[/code]
I get this error while trying to run the server again. I don't know what is wrong, or what this error means? Could someone please help me.?
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8528 Nomad" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:4110) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:32) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:65)[/code]

item.title: Run server error
